      • createEvent

        @RequestMapping(path="/createEventSuccess",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createEvent​(@Valid @ModelAttribute("event")
                                                                @Valid Event event,
                                                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        This method will carry out the event creation by sending the validated event to the business service
        Parameters:
        new - event with needed attributes
        binding - result
        Returns:
        adminEventsPage, if the creation was successful; createEventPage with errors displayed, if unsuccessful

                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView displayEventUpdatePage​(@RequestParam(name="eventId")
                                                                           int id)
        This method will display the updateEventPage
        Parameters:
        id - of event to be updated
        Returns:
        updateEventPage, if the connection was successful; errorPage with errors displayed, if unsuccessful

      • updateEvent

        @RequestMapping(path="/updateEventSuccess",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateEvent​(@Valid @ModelAttribute("event")
                                                                @Valid Event event,
                                                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        This method will carry out the event update by sending the validated event to the business service
        Parameters:
        event - with edited attributes
        binding - result
        Returns:
        adminEventsPage, if the update was successful; updateEventPage with errors displayed, if unsuccessful

      • deleteEvent

        @RequestMapping(path="/deleteEvent",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteEvent​(@RequestParam(name="eventId")
                                                                int id)
        This method will carry out the event deletion by sending the event id to the business service
        Parameters:
        id - of event to be deleted
        Returns:
        adminEventsPage, if the deletion was successful; errorPage with errors displayed, if unsuccessful
